explanation.title: Your First React Component
explanation.intro: A React component is a JavaScript function that returns JSX to describe what appears on screen. Let's build your first one!
explanation.exampleDescription: Here's what a complete component looks like:

step1.title: 1. Function Declaration
step1.description: Start with a function. The name should start with a capital letter.

step2.title: 2. Return JSX
step2.description: Return JSX (looks like HTML) to describe your UI.

step3.title: 3. Export Default
step3.description: Export your component so it can be used.
